nodes.text: Porto was an individual who lived on the desert planet Jakku about 29 years after the Battle of Jakku. Along with a crew, Porto scavenged the remains of the battle, selling their findings to Unkar Plutt in Niima Outpost. The scavenger Devi once claimed that Porto's crew brought in a hundred band limiters in one week.
Porto was first mentioned in Before the Awakening, a junior novel written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
